text:
A really nice and cosy rooftop bar area with a swimming pool with adults-only access.

Bar's menu has food offerings from the restaurant next to it. Alcohol offerings is extensive. Beer, wine, cocktails, mocktails and juices.

Has an amazing view of the entire beach line and the sea.

A very good place to get a free show of Wings Of Time at Siloso beach.

Staff here are friendly and service is quick.

Great place to hangout at night.

Came here for birthday celebration, was supposed to be outdoor but it was raining so we shifted in to the lounge. We are delighted with the great ambience and service. Special thank you to Alif who is very hospitable and make our day! ðŸ¥°

I had a wonderful experience at this restaurant. The food was delicious, the atmosphere was inviting, and the service provided by Jack was top-notch. One suggestion for improvement would be to update the glassware. Using newer, more polished glassware would enhance the presentation and overall quality of the beverages. Otherwise, everything was great!

We needed to grab a bite before heading to the airport, but our hotel didnâ€™t have any dining options available between 3-5 PM. Thankfully, this restaurant welcomed us with open arms.

The food was delightful, and the service was outstanding. The views and ambiance added to the overall experience, making it a truly enjoyable meal.

Had a wonderful experience over at 1-Altitude Coast. Came here for the rooftop pool and fireworks as it was a friend's birthday. The food was impeccable and the atmosphere was definitely convivial. Yureii, Amelia & team provided a splendid service as they attended to our requests efficiently. Will definitely bring more friends & family to experience this magnificient place.
